detail_desc: Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Calf-length pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with a small frill trim at the top, an elasticated, drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Jersey lining.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Jersey lining.

Rain mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the top and an elastic strap with a press-stud around the wrists. Fleece lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in airy mesh and a pair of trousers in jersey. Round-necked T-shirt with a trim around the neckline. Knee-length shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a reflective print on one leg. Elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey. Straight-style T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motif on the front. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a small reflective detail at the hem.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and a pair of knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and a pair of knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Sports trousers in windproof functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Elasticated waist, zipped side pockets, a reflective print on one leg and elasticated hems.

Short, fitted dress in airy, patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Draped front and a gathered seam at the back of the skirt. Long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders for added volume. Jersey lining.

Short, fitted dress in airy, patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Draped front and a gathered seam at the back of the skirt. Long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders for added volume. Jersey lining.
Track jacket with reflective details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, welt pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with visible flatlock seams in a contrasting colour, and a reflective print detail at the hem.
A-line dress in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Dress in lightweight cotton twill with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Set with a dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy and a top in cotton jersey. Dress with an embroidered motif on the front, elastication at the back of the waist and straps that cross at the back. Top with a round neck and long sleeves.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a frill over the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in an Oxford cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, short sleeves, chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Short dress in an Oxford cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, short sleeves, chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Short dress in an Oxford cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, short sleeves, chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in grained imitation leather with a regular waist, zip at the back and short slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
Jumpers in fine-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumpers in fine-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Shopper in braided plastic tape with two handles at the top. Unlined. Depth 16 cm. Height 30 cm. Width 51 cm.
Small hair elastics in various colours, four of which are glittery. No metal clips. Circumference 8 cm.
Straight-style nightshirt in a soft weave with a collar and V-shaped opening, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.

Oversized shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in braided straw with a flat crown. Width of brim 8 cm.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with a pompom on the top, a ribbed, turned-up hem, earflaps and ties under the chin.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with a pompom on the top, a ribbed, turned-up hem, earflaps and ties under the chin.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets, pleats at the top and shaping darts at the back. Tapered legs.
Short, fitted skirt in slightly stretchy woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and slit at the back. Woven lining made from recycled polyester.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a deep V-neck at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, gently flared legs. Lined. The polyester content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side and pleats at the front. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Joggers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
